name: 簡嘉玲
objective:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
凡學生有全民英檢中級（初試）、托福成績500分、電腦托福成績173分或本校英語能力鑑定考試中級、全校英語演講或寫作比賽得獎之證明，可申請抵免本門課程。
schedule:
Week 01 (02/20)	Introduction to the course
Week 02 (02/27)	Listening 1 + Reading 1
Week 03 (03/05)	Listening 2 + Reading 2
Week 04 (03/12)	Listening 3 + Reading 3
Week 05 (03/19)	Listening 4 + Reading 4
Week 06 (03/26)	Listening 5 + Reading 5
Week 07 (04/02)	Quiz: An Inconvenient Truth
Week 08 (04/09) 	Review
Week 09 (04/16)	Mid-term Exam
Week 10 (04/23)	Listening 6 + Reading 6
Week 11 (04/30)	Listening 7 + Reading 7
Week 12 (05/07)	Listening 8 + Reading 8
Week 13 (05/14)	Listening 9 + Reading 9
Week 14 (05/21)	Listening 10 + Reading 10
Week 15 (05/28)	Quiz: Charlotte’s Web
Week 16 (06/04)	Review
Week 17 (06/11)	Review
Week 18 (06/18)	Final Examination
scorePolicy:
1. Classroom Participation & Quizzes—40%
2. Mid-term Examination—30%
3. Final Examination—30%
